MAP.NAME: init
MAP.COMMENT: normalize pipeline arguments: EDIINT content handler will add a stream to the pipeline, default handler adds contentStream

BRANCH.NAME: true
BRANCH.COMMENT: invoked as top-level service, so set response as appropriate

BRANCH.NAME: true
BRANCH.COMMENT: return an HTTP error response as an exception occurred

INVOKE.NAME: permafrost.tundra.content.MalformedException
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 400 Bad Request and error message in response body

INVOKE.NAME: permafrost.tundra.lang.SecurityException
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 403 Forbidden and error message in response body

INVOKE.NAME: permafrost.tundra.content.UnsupportedException
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 406 Not Acceptable and error message in response body

INVOKE.NAME: permafrost.tundra.content.DuplicateException
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 409 Conflict and error message in response body

INVOKE.NAME: permafrost.tundra.content.ValidationException
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 422 Unprocessable Entity and error message in response body

INVOKE.NAME: $default
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 500 Internal Server Error and error message in response body

INVOKE.NAME: $default
INVOKE.COMMENT: return HTTP 202 Accepted and bizdoc id in response body

BRANCH.NAME: $default
BRANCH.COMMENT: called by another service, so let it handle the exception by rethrowing
